entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Omnibus 2002/9. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.
entry.dcterms:creator: Dávid, Kriszta
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-F52: TÁRKI Omnibus 2002/9. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.. data sheet. Version: 2007-01-19
entry.dcterms:creator: 1. Gazsó, Tibor
2. Róbert, Péter
2. Tóth, István György
3. Surányi, Péter
entry.dcterms:description: 1) satisfaction with the work of the government and opposition, satisfaction with democracy, party preferences 2) subjective financial situation, economic expectations 3) opinions about using two-stroke cars
entry.dcterms:subject: income, property and savings
political ideology
mass political behavior, attitudes
transport, travel (and mobility)
person
survey data
cross-section

A multi-stage proportionally stratified random probability sample representative of the Hungarian adult population. Unsuccessful inquiries were substituted with supplementary addresses, where persons to be interviewed were selected on the basis of the Leslie Kish key.
face-to-face interview
entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
entry.dcterms:subject: SPSS portable datafile
